fg_segments: 404We are sorry, the page or section you have attempted to access cannot be found.Please try the options below:
Tell us what you were trying to find... Leave your feedback...

h2, .h2 { font-size: 22px; } h3, .h3 { font-size: 18px; } .fourofour h1 { font-size: 100px; } .fourofour h1, .fourofour h2, .fourofour h3, .fourofour h4, .fourofour h5, .fourofour h6{ font-family: Montserrat; font-weight: 700; } .fourofour h1, .fourofour p.lead { background-color: rgba(46, 44, 44, 0.8); color: #fff; display: table; padding: 10px; } .fourofour .container.displaybarholder { display: none; } .fourofour .container.main { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) url("http://www.salford.ac.uk/__data/assets/image/0009/801846/Thumbs-down.jpg") repeat scroll 0 0 / cover ; } .fourofour .link-to-footer img { position: relative; right: -130px; top: -2px; margin: 20px 0; } .fourofour .mainsearch { margin: 20px 0; } .fourofour .container.main { padding-bottom: 0; } .fourofour .feedback { margin-top: 10px; } .fourofour .feedback .btn { margin-bottom: 10px; margin-top: 10px; } .fourofour .feedback-container iframe { position: absolute; top:0; left: 0; width: 100%; max-width; 100% height: 100%; } .fourofour footer { background: #333; color: #fff; } .fourofour footer a { color: #fff; } @media (max-width: 995px) { .fourofour .container.main { background: url(http://www.salford.ac.uk/__data/assets/image/0006/802986/Thumbs-down-small.jpg); background-size: cover; } } @media (max-width: 625px) { .fourofour h2, .fourofour h3 { background-color: rgba(46, 44, 44, 0.8); color: #fff; display: table; padding: 10px; } } @media (max-width: 550px) { .fourofour .container.main { background-position: right; background-size: cover; } .fourofour h1 { font-size: 40px; } #query { font-size: 12px; } }

The University of Salford, The Crescent, Salford, M5 4WT, UK - 0161 295 5000
